title: It is very similar to EF Digital Sans but the R is different.. and other letters not rounded.
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102222012im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bob2_6596.jpg)

 [‹ E with angle(s)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102222012/http:/typophile.com/node/48436 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font «Flourish – Art from Wales» publication, 2005 ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102222012/http:/typophile.com/node/48148 "Go to next forum topic")
author: amiart

comments.content:
I think It is! Neo Sans Black or bold.

JH

It could also be Prototype. Very similar.

[http://www.1001fonts.com/font\_details.html?font\_id=2271](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102222012/http:/www.1001fonts.com/font_details.html?font_id=2271 "http://www.1001fonts.com/font\_details.html?font\_id=2271")

Prototype is close, but not as classy as Neo Sans IMO.

JH
